title: Interpretation of a dream about going to a train station in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about going to a train station in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about going to a train station in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of, let us get to know the interpretations of the working scholars for this dream, and the reader should know that those in charge of the site They do not make interpretations, rather it is from the heart the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of the dream of going to the train station in a dreamGoing to the train station in a dream can mean that wishes and dreams come true thanks to God. Anyone who sees in a dream that he went to the train station may indicate changes that It occurs in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing yourself going to the train station in a dream could mean that you will get rid of the problems and fears that the dreamer faces during those days. A person’s arrival at the train station in a dream may indicate good events occurring in his life during This period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to a party in a dream: A person’s dream that he went to a party in a dream may indicate getting rid of worries and sorrows in his life. Whoever dreams that he went to a party full of singing may indicate the sadness that the dreamer feels in That time. Attending a party in a dream may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. Anyone who dreams that he went to a party may indicate the end of a certain phase of his life and entering a new phase with God’s grace. The interpretation of the dream of going to a wedding is unknown in A dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he went to an unknown wedding may indicate changes in circumstances for the better. A person’s dream that he is going to an unknown joy may indicate the happiness that the dreamer will have in those days. Whoever dreams that he went to an unknown wedding may indicate It indicates some problems and disagreements that the dreamer may face during those days. Interpretation of a dream about going to the king’s palace in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that he has gone to a spacious palace in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money during this period. Going to The king’s palace in a dream indicates a high status or positive changes occurring to the dreamer during this time. Anyone who sees in a dream that he went to the king’s palace may indicate rejection of the pressures that the dreamer was facing at that time. A dream of going to the king’s palace in a dream may indicate blessings. The many dreams that the dreamer will receive in these days, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of going with the dead and then returning in a dream. Going with the dead and returning again in a dream can mean that many doors of sustenance and goodness will open. Anyone who sees in his dream that a dead person has left him But he came back again, it could indicate the changes that occurred in his life during this time. The dream of going with the dead in a dream and returning may indicate the happy news that the dreamer will receive at that time. Whoever sees in his dream that he is going with the dead, but something went wrong And returned again, it can indicate happy changes and seeking news

title: Interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the dream of seeing the neck in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin The earring is considered one of the important accessories for women, because it gives a distinctive appearance to the ear, and countless shapes and colors have appeared from it, in addition to the gold and silver earring, and seeing an earring in a dream has many interpretations. Many of them have a desire to meet her, and the interpretation of this dream differs between men and women. Interpretation of the neck in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing a missing neck in a dream is evidence that the dreamer feels stressed and anxious about something, but he will be on the right track. Whoever sees a person losing his neck, this indicates The presence of bad friends in the dreamer’s life. Seeing buying a neck indicates tremendous nourishment and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s earring. Whoever sees in a dream a woman wearing an earring, it is his source of livelihood on the road. The neck in general in a dream looks good. Seeing a pearl earring in a dream indicates a happy life New for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a neck for a single woman. Alone when she looks inside. The dream: She wears a gold earring as a sign of the approaching date of her wedding. Gold in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates happiness, joy, and her marriage to a man who loves her. A silver earring in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her engagement in the near future. Interpretation of a dream Neck for a married woman: Wearing a bra in a dream for a married woman is a sign of good news. The neck in a dream for a woman who will get married soon is evidence of pregnancy. Losing your neck in a dream for a married woman means that she feels insecure and vulnerable to some problems in her life. Wearing a gold earring In a married woman’s dream, it indicates a lot of sustenance. A silver earring in a married woman’s dream indicates the joy and happiness that she will have in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a neck: Seeing a man wearing a gold earring in a dream indicates marital happiness in which he will find himself, regardless of the abundance of food for him. When a man sees that he is giving his neck to his wife, this is evidence of the stability of his marital life. If he sees a woman wearing an earring in his dream, this is a blessing and good news. Seeing a gold earring in an unmarried young man’s dream is a sign of good news. A gold earring in a young man’s dream indicates his relationship with a beautiful girl. Nice. Buying a necklace in a young man’s dream indicates the happiness he experiences. A golden earring in a young man’s dream is evidence of success at work. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s earring in a dream. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream wearing a golden earring, this indicates the presence of a male child. A silver necklace in a dream is pregnancy. With his child. If you lose your neck in a dream, you will lose a loved one. Buying a neck in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the soonest due date. Interpretation of a dream about losing your neck in a dreamDreaming about losing a neck and losing it in the owner’s dream is an annoying dream that portends death or loss and may indicate that the dreamer is busy With worldly affairs and temptations, and he does not pay attention to his religion. A dream about losing your neck may be a sign of the dissolution of the relationship with its owner, and God Almighty is the All-Knowing, the Most High. Interpretation of wearing a neck in a dream for a divorced woman, I mean, I see a divorced woman wearing a neck

title: I dreamed that I killed a snake, so what is the interpretation of the dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that I killed a snake. A snake is a wild reptile that can cause panic and anxiety to those who see it. As for dreams, will seeing a snake in a dream be good or bad? This is what we will try to discover in the following lines, so that the fortuneteller’s heart will be reassured and will not be distracted between the different connotations. Read with us. I dreamed that I killed a snake. Many interpretive scholars said that seeing a snake killed in a dream shows the radical changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life and will completely change the course of his life, and it predicts that He will receive a lot of good news that satisfies the heart in the next few days, God willing. There are other opinions of some interpreters of seeing a snake killed in a dream, the most important of which is that the dreamer will be blessed with many blessings and receive a girl who will live with him in a state of love and financial stability. I dreamed that I killed a snake according to Ibn Sirini, says the scholar The great Ibn Sirin: Seeing a snake being killed in a dream is a praiseworthy vision that portends goodness and abundance in his life in the coming periods. I have hurt him a lot in the past few years. Seeing yourself killing a snake during a dream means getting rid of people who tried to introduce many false ideas and controlling them to a great extent. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. A site about secrets Interpretation of dreams: Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that I killed a snake for an unmarried woman. Many interpretive scholars said that seeing a snake killed in a dream for an unmarried woman means that there are many hateful people who harm her life a lot and perform acts of magic and sorcery until they harm her, but she You will find a lot of people. Who will help her next time? There is another opinion of leading interpretation scholars that an unmarried woman dreams that she kills a snake in her dream, and this is a sign that she will get rid of people who do the lowest work for her and plan great machinations to happen. In her country, she will meet many people who want to come to her. I dreamed that I killed a snake for the sake of a married woman. Many scholars and translators indicated that seeing a snake killed in a married woman’s dream indicates that she got rid of the people who mourned her and her life and the end of her relationship with her husband. And the major crises that she was in. I dreamed that I killed a pregnant snake. Seeing a snake being killed in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will be relieved from the stages of extreme fatigue that she went through due to her pregnancy, and as soon as she gives birth to her child, it will bring with her all good things and joy. Whereas, if a woman sees the presence of a snake in her bed But she was able to kill him in her dream. This is a sign that she discovered her husband’s betrayal of her and that she was always having many forbidden relationships and the relationship with him will end completely. As for the pregnant woman who sees a snake in general in her dream, this indicates her liberation from the acts of envy and jealousy that have always existed. In her life because of the people closest to her. I dreamed that I killed a snake for the sake of the woman

title: Detailed interpretation of the dream of marriage by Ibn Sirin (for single women and men)

preview.html: Have you dreamed that you are getting married or that someone has this dream for you and you want to know the interpretation of this dream with all the popular interpretations of the great dream interpreters? In this topic in a fine magazine, I present to you everything related to the interpretation of the dream of marriage in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man in detail. Interpretation of the dream of marriage according to psychology and dream interpreters. Interpretation of dreams is a term known since ancient times and is used to find out the meaning of dreams that a person cannot interpret. Since ancient times In ancient times, they used the term visions to interpret dreams and believed that dreams were divided into two parts. A true vision is from God Almighty, and it is a dream of something good and beautiful. A false vision is the work of Satan and brings evil to humans. Dreams generally carry messages that alert the dreamer, and therefore a person must believe in the interpretation of dreams. And when you wake up and see a wedding in a dream, which makes you feel more comfortable and happy, then you need to know the meaning and interpretation of the dream of wedding. Interpretation of the dream of marriage in psychology. In general, the interpretation of the dream of marriage in a dream is commitment, comfort, and transformations that a person goes through in his life. , which often constitutes a person's transition to a new stage. Observing the wedding If you see yourself attending a wedding with another person, it means that you feel comfortable and reassured about this person. Attending someone else's wedding means that you know the traits of this person better, because you need these qualities These qualities must be in you. Marriage proposal: If the dream is a marriage proposal made by someone to you, this means that things, situations or circumstances around you will turn for the worse. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a lover: If you see yourself marrying someone with whom you have an emotional relationship, this means That you are the protector of the relationship between you and that you are a person who sacrifices a lot to maintain the relationship. You may be interested in: Marrying a Christian woman in a dream Looking at wedding cakes This indicates happiness on your way and that you have a bright and happy future ahead of you. Wedding dress in a dream Seeing a wedding dress in a dream means that you are a romantic woman You respect emotional relationships, but seeing yourself looking for a wedding dress on wedding days means that you fear the life to come. Seeing the wedding ceremony ending in disaster. The meaning of seeing the wedding ceremony ending in disaster is that you are carrying a lot of negative feelings inside you, and if you have this dream during the period of attending the wedding, then this It means that you are worried about organizing the wedding. And because of disagreements about the ceremony and its details. To attend a wedding alone This shows your life path and depends on how you feel in the dream. If you feel happy, it means that you will go through a new happy change in your life, but if you are upset and sad, it means that you are not satisfied with the current situation in your life and that you feel sad. Interpretation of a wedding ring If you see a wedding ring in a dream, it means permanent and eternal love between you and Whoever you love, but if you are not married, this means that you have reached a great and good stage in your emotional relationship. As for seeing the wedding ring lost, this means

title: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dark place in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Interpretation of dreams about being imprisoned in a dark place in a dream. Seeing darkness in a dream shows the psychological state and what the dreamer feels, because it shows his feeling of extreme loneliness even if he is with a thousand people and his feeling of alienation even among his family and loved ones. This may be because of the circumstances surrounding him or because his fear From the future it will have more serious meanings if he is imprisoned in this dark place. Below we explain Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of imprisonment in a dark place in a dream and we will discuss the different interpretations of this vision that differ for the dreamer depending on whether he is a man, an unmarried girl, or a married woman. . Or the pregnant woman in detail as follows: Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that when a person sees in a dream that he is walking in a dark place or street, this indicates the dispersion of his affairs and the instability of the state of confusion in the affairs of his life. Being confined in a dark place was a sign of feeling extremely afraid of something or of his inability to face problems and his inability to overcome obstacles in his way. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for an unmarried girl. Darkness in an unmarried girl’s dream is unpleasant, as it warns that dreams The aspirations that she wants to achieve will not come true, as if she sees herself trapped in a dark place, as this indicates that she is living in an extreme state. The fear that she is. An indication of his coexistence in a state of extreme loneliness and the absence of God knows - what is the meaning of security and peace. But if she saw that she was imprisoned in a dark place, but she saw a ray of light as if she had found a way out, then this is a sign that she has survived hardships and will overcome the crises that she is going through, what may be. Psychological, family, or emotional crises, God willing. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself imprisoned in a dark place and does not find a way out, then her dreams are not good, as they warn of serious worries, sorrows, and sorrows. Also, seeing darkness in a married woman’s dream indicates However, she feels very distressed. . In her life. But if he sees a flash of light, it is a good omen. Her dreams are evidence of the arrival of relief after severe distress and relief after the experience, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing darkness in a dream in general is an undesirable vision because it has dire consequences. If a pregnant woman sees that she is imprisoned in a very dark place, Her visions indicate that this woman is living in severe psychological distress and physical exhaustion. And that she is suffering from her pregnancy, but if she sees that she is walking in a dark place, but she sees a light at the end of the road, it is a sign of the arrival of comfort and the end of suffering. And the difficulties she was going through, God willing. If you have a question or dream that you want explained, do not hesitate to ask your question in the comments box and we will respond to you as soon as possible. We also invite you to follow our pages on social networking sites Facebook, Twitter, and others to get everything exclusively for dream interpretation, and we wish you the best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a single woman

preview.html: I like fans subscribers fans Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for an unmarried woman Watermelon is one of the fruits that many people love, especially in the summer, as it is cool and refreshing, but watermelon is a fruit that carries many interpretations if seen in a dream, especially with different colors. To learn more about seeing watermelon in a dream, follow the article below from the Shamloul website. Watermelon in general is one of the things that bring good interpretations and indicate goodness and life in a dream. Here are the most important interpretations of seeing a watermelon: Yellow watermelon in a dream Whoever sees that he is eating and eating a yellow watermelon in a dream, this indicates that he has many problems, issues and severe distress, and whoever sees him picking a yellow watermelon, this is evidence of the mother’s illness. Red watermelon in a dream Whoever dreams that he is eating a watermelon in a dream is in general distress and escapes from it, because this distress can be a prison. Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating a green, ripe, fresh and large watermelon, this is evidence of an abundance of money in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing someone reaching the sky and picking up a watermelon This dream usually shows that the sleeper asks the world a question, no matter how much he asks for a king, for example, and he gets it, God willing. A dream of a watermelon for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees herself eating a watermelon at an inappropriate time, this is a sign of tension and anxiety. But if a woman sees me eating a lot of large watermelons, this is evidence that she will soon marry a man of good morals and sufficient livelihood. Interpretation of seeing throwing a watermelon Whoever sees in his dream that Someone threw a watermelon at one of the houses, most likely the owner of that house will die, and God knows best. In front of those who see that the watermelon is not crazy yet and is not broken and is not ready to eat, this means that the sleeper will be told about pleasant things in the near future, perhaps healing, nutrition, children and general blessings. Watermelon in a pregnant woman's dream If a pregnant woman sees a watermelon during pregnancy, this is a sign that the date of birth is approaching, but if the pregnant woman eats it, this is evidence that her birth will be easy, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a red watermelon if it is cut in a dream If a single person sees himself specifically cutting a watermelon, this is a sign that he will get married, and seeing a large red watermelon cut when he is single, this is a sign of having a good wife soon. Today we told you the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream, whether for a single person, a virgin, a married woman, a man, a pregnant woman, and other professions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an ophthalmologist by Ibn Sirinana What I mean: Seeing going to an ophthalmologist in a dream means hearing good and happy news during the next period of the dreamer’s life. Also, seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream is a vision of success and excellence in scientific and professional life, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is going To an ophthalmologist, this indicates that she is a social person and shares people’s joys and sorrows. Also, seeing a dream of going to an ophthalmologist indicates recovery from almost all diseases and trust in God Almighty. Seeing an ophthalmologist in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is in a clinic An ophthalmologist, this indicates her success in her work and excellence in her studies. Also, seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream indicates her close marriage to a person who suits her well and determines the date of the marriage contract. This vision also shows the end of her problems and worries and that she is a social girl who loves gatherings and acquaintances. And if the girl sees For an unmarried woman to see an ophthalmologist treating her, this means that she hears good news and will be happy to hear it. Seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is resorting to an ophthalmologist, this is a sign of her freedom from sins and disobedience and her closeness to God Almighty. And if the wife dreams that Her daughter being an ophthalmologist in a dream, this is evidence of success and distinction in her home, a broad diet, and a decent life. Also, if a married woman sees that strangers are treating her, this indicates that she will marry this person and betray her husband. Seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees that she Going to the ophthalmologist, this indicates the ease of giving birth to a very beautiful girl. Also, seeing an ophthalmologist’s clinic in a married woman’s dream indicates the joy she will feel and the end of problems. Interpretation of a dream about an ophthalmologist in a dream about a man: To see a married man in his dream is to go to the ophthalmologist to be examined, This indicates that he needs treatment if he is sick as soon as possible. Also, to see a beautiful clinic for one man indicates his good work, his diet is plentiful and a good husband is nearby. Also, if a man sees that an unknown and unknown doctor is treating him, this indicates the collapse of problems Heartaches and disagreements at home. Interpretation of seeing an X-ray in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is taking an God knows. Also, seeing a beam of light working in a dream brings luck and livelihood, and the single girl or guy enters a new job and does a good job. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a family member betraying you in a dream

preview.html: Betrayal is one of the worst feelings a lover can experience, because it represents a wound to dignity and pride, weakens self-confidence, and can end the relationship. It has to do with reality, as some believe, and this is what I will explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman - the symbol of a mouse in a dream. Interpretation of betrayal of a lover in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin believes that betrayal of a lover in a girl’s dream may portend the girl’s loyalty and loyalty to her lover and that he may He will marry her in the near future. Some psychologists believe that seeing a lover betraying her could be a vision that stems from the intense love within this girl for her lover and her fear of losing him. Also, the girl who was betrayed in the dream indicates this girl’s excellence in her studies and her obtaining distinguished grades in her studies. This year. Some commentators believe that the betrayal of an unmarried lover could be a warning sign for this girl about the bad way she treats her lover. Interpretation of a dream about wrestling in a dream. Betrayal in a dream for a single woman. Al-Nabulsi says that an unmarried girl who has been betrayed by her friends could be a sign of This girl will suffer from poverty and suffering for a long time. Seeing betrayal in a dream of an unmarried girl means that the dreamer will suffer from worries and sorrows that will continue for a period. Seeing betrayal in a dream by some of her colleagues may indicate that this girl has left her current job, lost her strength, or Her position. However, if a single girl deceives herself in a dream, this indicates that girl’s bad morals and her bad intentions towards others. Interpretation of seeing a dragon in a dream by Ibn Sirin - The symbol of seeing a dragon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal by her lover in a man’s dream. Ibn Sirin says: If a man betrays himself This may indicate the stability of the family situation between him and the husband. Cheating in a man’s dream could indicate the imminent appearance of pregnancy in the wife, which may increase the love for the wife in the man’s heart. As for a man who was betrayed by a friend, this may indicate that this man will fall In difficult problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream. Interpretation of betrayal in a dream for a single woman. Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing the preacher betray the dreamer may mean that this girl will fall into major financial problems in the coming days. But if the girl is the one who betrays the lover in the dream, That girl is committing immoral acts, sins, and disobedience, and she must repent to God Almighty. However, some commentators confirm that seeing a girl’s betrayal is one of the indications of strengthening the bond between her and her lover through the formal connection between them. Interpretation of a dream about sea waves in a dream. Interpretation of seeing betrayal in a dream For a woman: Interpretation of a dream about a storm in a dream. A large group of dream interpreters believe that seeing her husband’s betrayal in a dream indicates a major positive change in this woman’s life and may indicate trips with her husband abroad. If the dreamer is pregnant, then seeing her lover’s betrayal of her is one of the signs that This portends that a woman will easily give birth. Many married women see that

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing projectiles in a dream by the most famous interpretive scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing missiles in a dream by the most famous scholars of interpretation. It is worth noting that seeing a missile in a dream is considered one of the visions that indicate strength in the personality of the dreamer. It also indicates deep thinking before making any decisions based on those details that we see in the dream. In the context of the article, we explain to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing missiles in a dream by the most famous scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing projectiles in a dream, as this vision is considered one of the mysterious visions that arouses the curiosity of many people to know what interpretations and explanations it contains, and it is also a vision that causes suffering to those who see it, and in this context we will explain it. To interpret the dream of seeing projectiles in a dream is also: Seeing projectiles in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin. It is a symbol of strength and courage for the seer, as it is considered one of the visions that indicate goodness and food. In addition, this vision indicates that he will get a new job opportunity and that he will achieve all the dreams he seeks in real life. If a person sees in a dream that the screaming is burning. It indicates illness or indicates loss of money. While it seemed that the shell fell in a dream on the house. It is evidence of the corruption that is spreading in this place. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing horses in a dream for a married and single woman in detail Interpretation of a dream of a missile escape for a single woman As these visions may be strange to many, which confuses the viewer with their connotations, meanings and different interpretations, as they are interpreted based on the condition of the viewer and the scenes he sees in the dream, and in the context we explain that to you. Interpretation of a dream of a missile escape for a single woman is also: It is worth noting that seeing war and missiles in a dream and escaping. It is evidence that the seer will achieve all his dreams and ambitions. Also Seeing a girl in a dream that someone is expelling her away in a dream of war and missiles. It is a sign and evidence that there are those who do not like her and hate her for the girl. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a wolf for a single, married or pregnant woman in Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a projectile in a dream for a single woman Especially since such a vision is considered very frightening and disturbing for many girls, which makes them curious to know the interpretations and interpretations it contains, and whether they are positive associations and good news or convey certain messages from the fortune teller, and in lines. We explain to you the interpretation of a projectile in a dream for a single woman, which consists of the following: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream the outbreak of war, and that she is participating in it. It is evidence of the approaching date of her marriage. In the event that the girl does not participate in the war and sees the missile in a dream. It shows that she will go through major crises in real life. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that missiles are burning, this is good news about excellence and success, whether at work or in study. A dream about a missile falling on the dreamer's house. It is a sign of goodness and happiness and also indicates a change in circumstances for the better. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see gloom in a dream for single and married women

title: Interpretation of a dream about shaking hands with the dead, seeing the dead, the deceased welcomes you

preview.html: Contents: Seeing a dead person shaking hands. The dead greeting you with his hand. An unmarried girl. For a married woman and a pregnant woman. By Ibn Sirin. By Imam al-Sadiq with the right hand. Interpretation of a dream about shaking hands with the dead. Whoever sees in a dream a dream in which a dead person or dead person greets him or shakes hands with him, then the dream in it indicates that the dead person will enjoy the afterlife and that his reward has come. To God and that He exists. Honor, God, hugging the dead or shaking hands with the dead has good and loving connotations, because the hand greeting is for someone you love gently, want something from, visit or receive with love. If a person dreams that he greets another person and there is no rivalry or enmity between them, this means that he will have good And security and joy. If he dreams of his death and greets him, then this indicates his good condition with God Almighty. And whoever sees that the dead person shook hands with him and greeted him, then this is explained by the dead person’s condition with his Lord, God willing. Likewise, whoever sees that the dead person is sleeping, this will comfort him. He may despair of obtaining it. As for someone who kisses a dead person whom he does not know, he is given money from a source he does not know, and if the deceased knew the fortuneteller, he will benefit from the inheritance money, or his knowledge, or his family left behind. Shaking hands with the dead or deceased alone is a sign of purity and purity of the heart and soul. If you shake hands A dead married woman, then she expects good news related to living, money or work. A married woman shaking hands with an unknown person or a stranger benefits in moving or traveling. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that the deceased hugged him with a strong hug and wanted him to hug his love, then the one who has a dream or a long dream. Interpretation Shaking hands with the late Sheikh Waseem Youssef - YouTube
